text:
e="preserve">Abdulkadir Mohamed Farah (15 February 1961 – 24 March 2020) was a Somali footballer. He was born in Beledweyne, Somalia. Farah began his career in 1976. He played at the regional level before playing club football for Batroolka. He also represented the Somali national team.
Farah died in a hospital in London from COVID-19 on 24 March 2020, aged 59.
